about_the_game:
A Digital Eulogy


John's Tombstone is a narrative game with 3 chapters each one completely different from the other. You will be driving a car in a dream, walking around on the afterlife and talking with angels to unravel a story of acceptance, sci-fi and emotional strength. The chapters here within will resonate more if you've lost someone dear to you.

Three Stories


  • A sci-fi, mindbending, emotional experience.
  • 3 stories tied by one unique arc
  • A mix of 3D and 2D with different mechanics on each chapter
  • A walking simulator experience, lots of dialogues written with wit and love
  • Discover the afterlife, the realm of dreams and much more!

Don't miss our demo!


Want to take a glimpse before the dive? Check out our free demo! It includes the Prologue and Chapter 1.

Something different


This game is the digital eulogy to my dad, a man whose name was not John. Each chapter will tell you a bit of how people fight with grief while giving you some good sci-fi, a thing that John really loved.

short_description: Drive inside a dream, explore one of Saturn's moons, and discover the afterlife. John's Tombstone is a walking simulator; a story split in three chapters, each chapter very different from the other. It's a sci-fi story with some emotional overtones.
